meanings.definition: A person or thing that evolves.
meanings.sent1: The evolver in the forest was the caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist believed that humans are the ultimate evolvers on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The evolver in the zoo was the chameleon changing colors to match its surroundings.
meanings.sent4: The evolver in the classroom was the student growing and learning every day.
meanings.sent5: The evolver in the garden was the seed sprouting into a beautiful flower.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that causes something to evolve.
meanings.sent1: The evolver in the lab was a special light that helped plants grow faster.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used a crop evolver to improve the quality of his vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The evolver in the kitchen was a blender that turned fruits into smoothies.
meanings.sent4: The music evolver in the studio transformed simple melodies into complex symphonies.
meanings.sent5: The technology evolver in the office upgraded computers to work more efficiently.

meanings.definition: A software program that helps in the evolution of something.
meanings.sent1: The educational evolver on the computer guided students through interactive lessons.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in a business evolver to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: The game evolver on the phone challenged players to adapt and improve their strategies.
meanings.sent4: The design evolver software transformed basic sketches into intricate blueprints.
meanings.sent5: The social media evolver app connected users with evolving trends and updates.
